rpo.tjcQol.enableExperimental.tooltip: Use features which are in development or experimental
rpo.tjcQol.enableCit.tooltip: Enable UI elements and other QOL features on thejocraft.net
rpo.tjcQol.enableRandomEntities.tooltip: Enable QOL features which are related to entities
rpo.tjcQol.disableCheats.tooltip: Disable Cheats which actually work on thejocraft.net
